concept.title: Hadoop Properties and Configuration Files
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the Hadoop FS origin to use HDFS properties.

conbody.p:
Hadoop FS originusing or adding HDFS propertiescustom propertiesHadoop FS originThe Hadoop FS origin provides the following options for using HDFS properties:Make sure changes go into the destination version of this file.
HDFS configuration files: core-site.xml and hdfs-site.xml You can store the core-site.xml and hdfs-site.xml configuration files in a directory local to the and define the directory in the origin.
Individual properties You can configure individual HDFS properties in the origin. To add an HDFS property, you specify the exact property name and the value. The Hadoop FS origin does not validate the property names or values.Individual properties override properties defined in the HDFS configuration file.
